Text:
Let us pray.
Forgive us, God Almighty. Only through Your forgiveness do we find the courage to follow Your only begotten Son. [t] To journey step after step, from life down into the darkness of the grave. [*] Give us the faith needed to follow Him through death, and to rise again with Jesus, into the newness of life with Him, who lives and reigns forever.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-19 - Paul Prins: Reworked to be more stylistically in line with my writing.
2024-01-18 - Constance McIntosh Smith: Changes to fix grammar issues.
2023-12-09 - Paul Prins: Fix grammar after the mid-point
